ComicInfo.Summary: Dollz,. A deadly mix of beauty and power. For the powerful, pleasure-seeking elite there is no greater symbol of status and wealth than to possess one of the Dollz. Only one man, Doktor Von Dahl can make their fantasies into reality. Upon their greed and lust he has built an empire that spans international borders and shapes global policy. What is his connection to Ms. B and the other Dollz, and what part do they play in his game of world domination? Let the games begin...
